summary: Provides an inâ€‘memory mock implementation of the AWS SageMaker service, defining data structures and helper utilities for resources such as models, endpoints, training jobs, pipelines, experiments, and related artifacts, and exposing a backend that supports create, read, update, delete, tagging, validation, and pagination operations.
business_intent: Allows developers to write and run unit tests or local development workflows that interact with SageMaker APIs without contacting real AWS services, thereby speeding up testing, reducing costs, and enabling offline validation of ML workflow code.
